# XmlRoundtripper.Write method

Write a document to file, replacing the header lines with the ones from the original input.

```csharp
public void Write(string newDoc, Stream output)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| newDoc | The contents of the new document, after being formatted |
| output | The stream to write the adjusted output to |
